color.description: Specify the control color, which can be any Material color (e.g. success or purple) or Css color (e.g. #033 or rgba (255, 0, 0, 0.5)). You can find a list of built-in color classes in the Colors page.
color.description_zh: 指定控件颜色，颜色值可以是任意 Material 颜色（例如 success 或者 purple ）也可以是 Css 颜色 （例如 #033 或者 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)）。在 颜色页中可以找到内置的颜色类列表。

disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state
disabled.description_zh: 将所有子组件置于禁用状态

mandatory.description: Force at least one item to be selected, if available.
mandatory.description_zh: 强制至少选择一个项目（如果可用）。

max.description: Set the maximum number that can be selected.
max.description_zh: 设置可以选择的最大数量。

:v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array
:v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v 模型值。如果组件支持 multiple 属性，则默认为空数组

multiple.description: Multiple items are allowed to be selected.

readonly.description: Make the entire extension panel read-only.
readonly.description_zh: 使整个扩展面板为只读。

selected-class.description: Configure the name of the CSS class that will be applied when the selected item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置被选中项目时应用的 CSS 类名。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

theme.description: Specifies the theme of this component and all of its subcomponents
theme.description_zh: 指定此组件及其所有子组件的主题

variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component
variant.description_zh: 对组件应用不同的样式

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes
events.description_zh: 组件模型更改时发出的事件
